name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.input.text
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        say/type:
          content: ## Inputs: Text
  
        text/prompt_key:
          label: Key:
          required@bool: yes
          type: uri
          placeholder: lowercase, a-z, 0-9, and underscore
  
        sheet/prompt_type:
          label: Type:
          data:
            freeform:
              name: Freeform
              description: An arbitrary string of text
            bool:
              name: Boolean
              description: true or false
            date:
              name: Date
              description: tomorrow 5pm, +2 weeks, Friday
            decimal:
              name: Decimal
              description: 3.1415
            email:
              name: Email
              description: client@example.com
            geopoint:
              name: Geopoint
              description: 44.226737, 20.7953 (lat, long)
            ip:
              name: IP
              description: 1.2.3.4 or a1b2:c3d4:e5f6:a1b2:c3d4:e5f6:a1b2:c3d4
            ipv4:
              name: IPv4
              description: 1.2.3.4
            ipv6:
              name: IPv6
              description: a1b2:c3d4:e5f6:a1b2:c3d4:e5f6:a1b2:c3d4
            number:
              name: Number
              description: 1234
            record_type:
              name: Record Type
              description: address, comment, ticket, worker
            timestamp:
              name: Timestamp
              description: 1601337600
            uri:
              name: URI
              description: alphanumeric_with_underscores (a-z, 0-9, _)
            url:
              name: URL
              description: https://example.com/path/file.png
          default: freeform
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: no
            columns:
              selection/__index:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/name:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
              text/description:
  
        text/prompt_default:
          label: Default:
          type: freeform
  
        sheet/prompt_required:
          label: Required:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            0:
              name: yes
            1:
              name: no
          limit: 10
          default: yes
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
            columns:
              selection/_selection:
                params:
                  mode: single
                  value_key: name
              text/name:

  return:
    snippet@text:
      text/{{prompt_key|lower}}:
        type: {{prompt_type}}
        {% if prompt_required == 'yes' -%}
        required@bool: yes
        {% endif -%}
        {% if prompt_default -%}
        default: {{prompt_default}}
        {% endif -%}
